77016c66-bcf4-4383-a40b-830fdea3552d.title: Paint Brush
77016c66-bcf4-4383-a40b-830fdea3552d.description:
This brush allows you to paint on canvases, aim it at one and begin painting!

#df7f00Controls:#919191
#ffffffLeft Click:#919191 Paint on the canvas
#ffffffRight Click:#919191 Erase painting on canvas
#ffffffRotate Blocks(default: #ff0000Q#ffffff):#919191 Open settings menu
#ffffffForce Build(default: #ff0000F#ffffff):#919191 Select point to draw a line from
#ffffffReload(default: #ff0000R#ffffff):#919191 Change the canvas' colour to your selected colour

0be11a4f-3161-4964-a874-f0fdd1e30b65.title: Canvas
0be11a4f-3161-4964-a874-f0fdd1e30b65.description:
Can be painted on with Paint Brushes!
Saving it on the lift will store the painting, so that you can spawn in and enjoy your precious art at any time!
